H0.text: What is the name of the hand signalling system used by bookmakers to convey horses' odds. Flashcode

H1.text: What is the name of the hand signalling system used by bookmakers to convey horses' odds. Bettor's Sign

H2.text: What is the name of the hand signalling system used by bookmakers to convey horses' odds. Pari-Mutuel Signals

H3.text: What is the name of the hand signalling system used by bookmakers to convey horses' odds. Tic-tac

A4.text: On-track bookies use tic-tac to communicate odds between staff.
